channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes in roadway of Whitethorn Drive, 15th February
item.description:
There are numerous potholes appearing in Whitethorn Drive. They are getting worse by the day? Please can someone survey & instruct remedial repairs. I thought the County Council had a duty to routinely inspect roadways on a periodic basis - this clearly has not been done recently in Whitethorn Drive!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Whitethorn Drive, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road gulley blocked causing dangerous road & footpath flooding, 15th February
item.description:
Road adj to lamppost 10 Bouncers Lane. Every time there is more than light rainfall, this is the scene. It has been terrible for the past few days and really needs sorting. It has been steadily getting worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 95, Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Its loads of potholes, 15th February
item.description:
By cheltenham fencing all the way to pillgrove way I live in the area and pay road tax to fix the roads seems like its ignored or at least put up traffic lights as it is going to cause damage to vehicles or some 1 will have a accident trying to dogge them
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham

item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Drain is now completely blocked outside 25/27 Alexandra Street, 15th February
item.description:
The gunk that is stuck in this drain was first reported around 18 months ago. Now it has utterly filled the drain so that the grate can hardly be seen. With the amount of rain, recently, and the fact it is almost the only drain on that side of the road, means that rainwater is gushing along the gutters.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Alexandra Street, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pothole punctured my tyre and damaged my wheel rim, 15th February
item.description:
On Leckhampton hill. Another report has referenced same pothole and have reported to emergency/urgent out of hours line but issuing here for completeness and reference no. I will be claiming and would like a claim form to be sent to me. This is second pothole on Leckhampton hill to puncture my tyres in past two months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
